Package com.pvchat.proximityvoicechat.plugin.distancematrix

Class PlayerDistanceAndVolumeCalculations

java.lang.Object
com.pvchat.proximityvoicechat.plugin.distancematrix.PlayerDistanceAndVolumeCalculations
public class PlayerDistanceAndVolumeCalculations extends Object
Class responsible for counting volume level between each player on the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerDistanceAndVolumeCalculations

      public PlayerDistanceAndVolumeCalculations(ProximityVoiceChat pluginInstance, int maxHearDistance, int noAttenuationDistance, Consumer<List<PlayerVolumeData>> stateChangeConsumer)
      Creates new PlayerDistanceAndVolumeCalculations instance.
      Parameters:
      pluginInstance - plugin instance.
      maxHearDistance - max distance (minecraft blocks count) in which two players can hear each other.
      noAttenuationDistance - distance (minecraft blocks count) in which two players can hear each other without decreasing volume level.
      stateChangeConsumer - method for sending volume data, it is implemented in PlayerVolumeServer

    • filterPlayerVolumeData

      public static List<PlayerVolumeData> filterPlayerVolumeData(List<PlayerVolumeData> matrix, DiscordUserID discordUserID)
      Filters volume level list so as to extract PlayerVolumeData related to user with given discordUserID.
      Parameters:
      matrix - volume list
      discordUserID - user discordID
      Returns:
      volume level list with the only volumes related to user with given discordUserID.
